content: vancouver specials half mitts diana twiss www 100milewear com this is a lovely half mitten perfect for mild winters - like the kind we get out here in vancouver - and days when there is a bit of chill but not enough to send you to the cupboard to dig out the full mittens made in a chunky hand spun are a bit dickensian made with wool blended with silk and alpaca they are downright elegant you can modify the cuff to give you whatever look you want knit in the round on four size 5mm needles they knit up so quickly you will find yourself making a pair for every occasion they also make great gifts copyright diana twiss 2010 all rights reserved vancouver specials half mitts yarn you can make these in many elann highland chunky 2 50 gram balls sizes the size listed is for a small can manage with one ball if you make the cuff a bit shorter or elann highland woman s hand to make medium wool 2 50 gram balls and any other add two stitches at the cast on fingering weight yarn like elann baby silk for large add four stitches confetti etc yarn is doubled needles cuff 4 double pointed 5mm cast on 24 stitches for size small join in the round being careful not to twist the notions stitches 8 8 8 sts on each needle for waste yarn medium size cast on 26 8 10 8 sts on tapestry needle each needle and for large 28 8 10 10 sts on each needle and using any of the gauge following patterns make a 2 ½ -
